title: Order the Eater Guide to Mexico City, Our Newest Travel Guide
summary: In 2017, Eater published its first travel package dedicated to an international destination — and it should surprise no one that it focused on Mexico City, where stellar meals, snacks, and sips engulf the 570-square-mile metropolis. So for the next installment in our series of travel books publishe…

title: Eater Wins Silver Medal From the Society of American Travel Writers
summary: Today, the University of Missouri School of Journalism announced the winners of its 2025 Lowell Thomas Travel Journalism Competition, overseen and funded by the Society of American Travel Writers Foundation. Eater was awarded a silver medal in the Special Packages/Series category for its multi-face…
